TextView.android:text: First, you want to select the region in which you would like to start removing invasive species. If you are in a place that borders two regions, you probably would want to take a look at both, as invasive species from both regions can be prevalent on the borders. Once you have selected a region, take a look at all the invasive species in the region. This will give you an idea of what speices to be on the lookout for. Misidentifying species can have harmful effects, so be sure that you have identified them correctly. When you find an invasive species, select it in the app for directions on how to remove it.
